com.samczsun.skype4j

Interface Skype


  • public interface Skype
    This class represents a single Skype account, which may or may not have been logged in

    • Method Detail

      • login

        void login()
    throws InvalidCredentialsException,
           ConnectionException,
           NotParticipatingException
        Log into Skype. This will perform the following actions: 1) Log into Skype to get a SkypeToken 2) Register an endpoint to get a RegistrationToken Note that the SkypeToken technically expires after 24 hours. The vanilla implementation in Skype for Web is to redirect you to the login screen. As such, roughly half an hour before 24 hours is hit, the API will attempt to re-login and, if subscribed, resubscribe.
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialsException - If you've provided invalid credentials or if you hit a CAPTCHA
        ConnectionException - If a network error occured while connecting
        NotParticipatingException - If the guest account cannot log in due to the chat not being open

      • subscribe

        void subscribe()
        throws ConnectionException
        Subscribe to the HTTP long polling service. This will start reading events from Skype and calling events within this API. Please note this call is not necessary if you do not plan on using the event API.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an connection error occurs during subscription

      • getUsername

        String getUsername()
        Get the username of the account logged in
        Returns:
        The username

      • getChat

        Chat getChat(String name)
        Get a Chat based on the identity given. The chat must already be loaded The identity is a Skype-assigned id that begins with 19: or 8:
        Parameters:
        name - The identity of the chat
        Returns:
        The Chat, or null if not found

      • loadChat

        Chat loadChat(String name)
       throws ConnectionException,
              ChatNotFoundException
        Load a Chat given an identity The identity is a Skype-assigned id that begins with 19: or 8:
        Parameters:
        name - The identity of the chat
        Returns:
        The newly loaded Chat
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs during connection
        ChatNotFoundException - If this skype account is not a member of the chat

      • getOrLoadChat

        Chat getOrLoadChat(String name)
            throws ConnectionException,
                   ChatNotFoundException
        Get a chat, and if said chat doesn't exist, load it
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the chat
        Returns:
        The chat
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an exception occurs while fetching chat details
        ChatNotFoundException - If the chat does not exist

      • joinChat

        GroupChat joinChat(String chatId)
            throws ConnectionException,
                   ChatNotFoundException,
                   NoPermissionException
        Join the chat with the given id in the format of 19:xxxxx@thread.skype
        Parameters:
        chatId - The skype chat id
        Returns:
        The group chat object
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an exception occurs while joining the chat
        ChatNotFoundException - If the chat does not exist
        NoPermissionException - If the chat is not public

        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of chats
        Returns:
        The chats loaded
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting
